ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Motion Picture - Echoes
ComicInfo.Summary: Echoes [Part 4]: With tensions rising between the Romulan Empire and the Federation related to the actions of Kirk and crew at the Neutral Zone, Kirk and Uhura board the Romulan ship in an attempt to capture Akris and disable his weapon of mass destruction. Meanwhile, General Nyota Uhura escapes from the Enterprise in her own ship with a plan to destroy the Romulan ship with Akris and the weapon, along with Kirk and Uhura.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 02:17:46. [CVDB1006794] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:21:34. [Issue ID 2561213]
